data.text: @joshi_mio Estamos trabajando en tu caso y tan pronto tengamos novedades nos comunicaremos contigo. Saludos.
@joshi_mio Hola, para brindarte una asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos indiques un idioma (español ó inglés) para comunicarnos. Saludos.

We want to simplify your trip! Follow these simple steps and obtain your baggage tag in just 15 seconds. You can now avoid crowds and have more time to enjoy for yourself. ✈  Innovating is #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/Xnte5D7Ldi https://t.co/iF3DuzceK1
@bostelmannz Hola, envíanos vía DM el código de reserva y nombre completo. Quedamos atentos.
@jeremyatl1 We replied to your DM. Regards.
@Lagrindia1 Hi, if you have a Travel Voucher, you can send us its number along with your full name and the passport number associated to it through a DM, so we can check that information. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Hi, we provided you a response via DM. Regards.

@tati_maia_rio Hi Tatiana, we are happy that you have chosen our airline to fly, we continue working every day to provide our passengers with a pleasant experience.
Greetings.
@gabrielelizondo We don't have any issue with our website, we can assist you in purchasing your tickets with a service fee through here. Regards.

@gabrielelizondo Our website can be affected by the cookies and the browser's history, you can delete them and try again to purchase the tickets, you can also use a different browser or device. Regards.
@gabrielelizondo If you need assistance, send us your booking code and full name through a DM. Regards.
@gabrielelizondo Hi, send us through DM the ticket number, booking code and full name of the passenger in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@ConiCanihuante Hola, cuéntanos vía DM si resolviste tu inconveniente. Quedamos atentos a tus comentarios. Saludos.

@juana23788686 Hola, verificamos que tu caso se encuentra en proceso de gestión.  Una vez finalizada recibirás la notificación vía email.  Ten presente que tu requerimiento fué registrado el día de ayer a las 01:27 horas. Saludos.
@TouringTony Hi, we want to look into this, please send us a DM with your booking code. Regards.
@Aviationbenx_19 Indeed, Ben, it's a great shot!
@juana23788686 Envianos un mensaje directo "DM". Saludos.
@juana23788686 Vamos a ocultar tu mensaje para proteger tus datos personales. Por favor envianos un DM. Saludos.

@juana23788686 Por favor envíanos los siguientes datos vía DM: nombre completo, número de socio, fecha de nacimiento, correo electrónico, país de residencia y último vuelo acreditado. Quedamos atentos.
@juana23788686 Hola, por favor indícanos tu número de caso vía DM. Quedamos atentos.

@ShayPurdy44 Hello, in order to check the status of your flight you can enter through the following link: 
https://t.co/wxB3ZkYXXV
Or you can provide us your reservation code and validate the passenger's name and surname through our inbox. 
Regards.

data.text:
@juniorfreitaas Hello, if you have any requirements, do not hesitate to write us. 
Regards.
@izamns Hello, we have answered you by DM. Regards.
@izamns Hi, send us the full name of the passenger along with the booking code and more details about the situation through a DM to look into it. Regards.
@1st_ck Hi, we are glad to assist you. See you aboard in a next occasion. Regards.
@CristianoFeit17 Hi, send us a DM with your booking code to look into it. Thanks.
@Tatiana96480821 Hi, send us a DM with your case number to look into it. Thanks.
@joshi_mio We added your comments to the case in order to assist you, and we will contact you via email as soon as possible. Regards.

@joshi_mio Hello, we are still working on your case, and more information will be sent via email as soon as possible; also, for a proper assistance, please choose just one language: Spanish, English or Portuguese. Regards.
Keep in mind that some states and/or counties in the United States have additional restrictions and recommendations. Please check them at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
Note that the United States recently imposed entry restrictions for Brazilian citizens or foreigners who have been in Brazil. More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
At the moment, the #CDC recommends that all international passengers comply with a quarantine (NOT mandatory). We recommend that you review these recommendations and additional requirements.
Passengers can also present a positive test result issued within 90 days, along with a proof of recovery. In both cases, a mandatory Health Declaration Form must be filled out.

data.text: At LATAM, we are celebrating the 10th anniversary of our LATAM Fuel Efficiency program, which contributes to the reduction of fuel consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. On the World Day for Reducing CO2 Emissions, being more sustainable is #WhatMakesUsFly. https://t.co/OEoCWRGmz9

data.text: @camilacirco Hello, according to what we spoke on the phone, we didn't make any changes on your reservation, as soon as you find the new dates you want to travel, write us back, and we will assist you. Regards.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: As of January 26th, all passengers traveling to the United States must present a negative COVID-19 testing result, taken no more than 3 days before the flight date, and also an affidavit. https://t.co/eMmkgznOUl https://t.co/ctaS39fqyL
